summary: This bill, the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009. It focuses on the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program, updating provisions related to eligible projects, monitoring, and funding. Key changes include expanding the scope of threats addressed, modifying funding levels, and incorporating innovative implementation mechanisms. The bill aims to improve forest health, reduce wildfire risk, and enhance watershed health.
